channel.title: Video: Button Masher
channel.description:
Description: Hey this is me, PEI WEI, and this is a video of me playing Mario Party 6 and doing a mini game that requires you to press the A button rapidly as fast as you can. Well of course I did it in a humourous way but then again I look like that when I acctually do try to press it as fast as I can which I did in this video, Enjoy.
Video: http://youtube.com/watch?v=J6rBPTH4K5s
Other Videos: http://freewebs.com/peiwei
Please avoid being a pain in the ass this was ment to be funny and if you havn't played this game or know about games that require you to press the A button fast then you wouldn't understand. Thanks.

item.title: Video: Button Masher
item.dc:creator: @kurt pixels
item.description:
@kurt wrote:

dude the worst mini-game from the n64 one was the paddle boat, it was the first time i ever played it and i put it in the palm of my hand and spun it sooo hard…i had the fattiest blister…fuck you mario! your parties suck

Read full topic

item.title: Video: Button Masher
item.dc:creator: @l_wind_i l wind i
item.description:
@l_wind_i wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:6, topic:8641”]omg who cares if you can push a button. fyi you got owned like 3 times before you could win.

then theres that gay video of someone crying about aryan. dude it died in like april, yet theres a movie about it from july 15? and you called it a bot several times, idiot.[/quote]

Sorry but we didn’t much know about Aryan we just did that for fun we never even used it. We just made the video to be funny.

pixels:

is this even the I wind i from sythe that I can faintly remember?

Yes i am l wind i from Sythe.org

[quote=“james, post:8, topic:8641”][quote author=exps35 link=topic=12251.msg138212#msg138212 date=1155101293]
omg who cares if you can push a button. fyi you got owned like 3 times before you could win.

then theres that gay video of someone crying about aryan. dude it died in like april, yet theres a movie about it from july 15? and you called it a bot several times, idiot.
[/quote]
die

and i wind i.

that was fucking hilarious. In um… mario party? that thing where you have to wind up the thing then let it go and rotate the thing

this is in 64

yeh anyway i got like a massive blister[/quote]

oooooohhhhh yeah i remember that i was the fastest at that to, and yeah i got huge blisters it wasn’t even funny, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Video: Button Masher
item.dc:creator: @l_wind_i l wind i
item.description:
@l_wind_i wrote:

[quote=“JukuG, post:4, topic:8641”][quote author=tom55 link=topic=12251.msg138126#msg138126 date=1155099282]
Dude anyone can push a damn button.
[/quote]

You must suck then.

omg i wind, you fast clicker.[/quote][quote=“JukuG, post:4, topic:8641”][quote author=tom55 link=topic=12251.msg138126#msg138126 date=1155099282]
Dude anyone can push a damn button.
[/quote]

You must suck then.

omg i wind, you fast clicker.[/quote]

Thanks yeah i have posted it on the Offical Nintendo forums and im going to have everyone view it and im going to be making sequals of different mini games that show how fast you can press for a certain time and im going to see if anyone through all of Nintendo can press faster, so far everyone says they can’t even get close.

Read full topic

item.title: Video: Button Masher
item.dc:creator: @Hyjall Hyjall
item.description:
@Hyjall wrote:

Interesting tactic. I got one aswell which I use to beat my friends at any mario party.

I take the controller and let all my muscles in the hand contract(sp) which makes my thumb shiver, making it pushing the button fast. It hurts like hell though.

I’m so pathetic for doing all that for a stupid mini game…

Read full topic
